means: 穿过( penetrate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Waves of misery penetrated every pore.
The knife had penetrated his chest.
They penetrated into territory where no man had ever gone before.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已进入先前没人去过的地区.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The odor penetrated the whole house ., 这气味弥漫着全屋.

list.abs: 油漆涂料英语专业词汇_百度文库 ... Paint nozzle 涂料喷头 Penetrant 渗透剂 Accelerate 促进剂.
-tion后缀 ... serration 锯齿状, 锯齿状突起 penetration 穿过, 渗透, 突破 arbitration 仲裁, 公断.
⒌穿透（penetration）（Penetration）─一个固体物毫发无伤的穿过另一个固体物。⒍复原（Restoration）─将完全破坏的东西恢复原状。
外显率（penetrance）指在特定环境中某一基因型（通常指杂合子）显示出相应表型的频率（以百分比表示）。也就是说同样的基因 …

entry.def: If something or someone penetrates a physical object or an area, they succeed in getting into it or passing through it.

example.tran: X射线能够穿透很多物体。

example.ex: His men had been ordered to shoot on sight anyone trying to penetrate the area.
example.tran: 他的部下已经接到命令，见到试图穿越该地区的人就开枪。

entry.def: If someone penetrates an organization, a group, or a profession, they succeed in entering it although it is difficult to do so.

example.ex: ...the continuing failure of women to penetrate the higher levels of engineering...
example.tran: 女性一直未能跻身工程领域的更高层

example.ex: The drugs industry is complex and hard to penetrate.
example.tran: 医药行业非常复杂，很难进入。

entry.tran: 打入，渗透（敌人或竞争对手内部）
entry.def: If someone penetrates an enemy group or a rival organization, they succeed in joining it in order to get information or cause trouble.

example.ex: The CIA had requested our help to penetrate a drugs ring operating out of Munich...
example.tran: 美国中央情报局已请求我们协助其打入在慕尼黑市外活动的贩毒集团。

example.ex: The army was one of the few institutions the secret police were not encouraged to penetrate.
example.tran: 军队是不鼓励秘密警察渗入的少数机构之一。

entry.def: If a company or country penetrates a market or area, they succeed in selling their products there.

example.ex: There have been around 15 attempts from outside France to penetrate the market.
example.tran: 大约已经有15家外国公司试图进入法国市场。

entry.def: If you penetrate something that is difficult to understand, you succeed in understanding it.

example.ex: ...long answers that were often difficult to penetrate.
example.tran: 往往难以理解的冗长回答

auth_sentence.content: In some places the waves penetrated six miles inland.
auth_sentence.res_content: In some places the waves penetrated six miles inland.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In some places the waves penetrated six miles inland.

auth_sentence.content: The afternoon sun penetrated the mass of honeysuckle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The afternoon sun penetrated the mass of honeysuckle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The afternoon sun penetrated the mass of honeysuckle.

auth_sentence.content: I don't think it's really penetrated very far.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think it's really penetrated very far.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think it's really penetrated very far.
